data.name: XPathSettings
desc: **since**
LibreOffice 4.1

properties.name: Addin
desc: Specifies the directory that contains spreadsheet add-ins which use the old add-in API.

properties.name: AutoCorrect
desc: The settings of the AutoCorrect dialog.
The value can be more than one path separated by a semicolon.

properties.name: AutoText
desc: The directory which contains the AutoText modules.
The value can be more than one path separated by a semicolon.

properties.name: Backup
desc: Automatic backup copies of documents are stored here.

properties.name: Basic
desc: The Basic files, used by the AutoPilots, can be found here.
The value can be more than one path separated by a semicolon.

properties.name: Bitmap
desc: This directory contains the icons for the toolbars.

properties.name: Config
desc: The configuration files are located here.
This entry cannot be changed by the user in Office user interface.

properties.name: Dictionary
desc: The provided dictionaries are stored here.

properties.name: Favorite
desc: Path to save folder bookmarks.

properties.name: Filter
desc: Specifies the directory where all the filters are stored.

properties.name: Gallery
desc: Specifies the directories which contains the Gallery database and multimedia files.
The value can be more than one path separated by a semicolon.

properties.name: Graphic
desc: This directory is displayed when the dialog for opening a graphic or for saving a new graphic is called.

properties.name: Help
desc: The path to the Office help files.

properties.name: Linguistic
desc: The files that are necessary for the spell check are saved here.

properties.name: Module
desc: This is the path for the modules.

properties.name: Palette
desc: This is the path to the palette files *.SOB to *.SOF containing user-defined colors and patterns.
The value can be more than one path separated by a semicolon.

properties.name: Plugin
desc: Plugins are saved in these directories.
The value can be more than one path separated by a semicolon.

properties.name: Storage
desc: Mail, News files and other information (for example, about FTP Server) are stored here.

properties.name: Temp
desc: The base url to the office temp-files.

properties.name: Template
desc: The templates originate from these folders and sub-folders.
The value can be more than one path separated by a semicolon.

properties.name: UIConfig
desc: Global directories to look for user interface configuration files.
The user interface configuration will be merged with user settings stored in the directory specified by UserConfig. The value can be more than one path separated by a semicolon.

properties.name: UserConfig
desc: Specifies the folder with the user settings.

properties.name: UserDictionary
desc: The custom dictionaries are contained here.

properties.name: Work
desc: The path of the work folder can be modified according to the user's needs.
The path specified here can be seen in the Open or Save dialog.
